name: OVERKILL (itch)
description:
Greetings!

Welcome to Overkill Pre-Alpha v0.0.5 Test! 

Overkill is a fast-paced action game that contains rogue-like elements. 

The game is nowhere near the final expected product, but at a state where feedback is as important as it can be!

Please do not hesitate to share your thoughts about the game!

Pre-Alpha Notice

Overkill does not have a dedicated tutorial at its current phase, but I believe that it is possible the get the hang of the game in a couple of minutes, by trial and error. If the project continues, there'll also be a descriptive tutorial where all mechanics are explained throughout the game.

Download Instructions

After you download the .zip file, extract it and keep .exe and .pck files in the same directory. Nothing else!

Controls

Here is the list of essential controls.

Navigation: LMB

Dodge Buttons: W, A, S, D

Artifact Selection: 1, 2, 3

Debug Mode: B

Mute All: M

Pause: P

Sources

I do not own any of the assets that are used in the making of Overkill but the code, please contact me for other asset sources.

Creatures & Icons - Aleksandr Makarov

Environment - Namatnieks
